overview:
Cristian Strat is the co-founder of Summify, a content curation and personalization platform.

Cristian interned at Google twice in California and Switzerland, working on ad scheduling algorithms and search backends.

Previously, he was the co-founder of Balaur.ro, a Romanian job search engine, and prior to that he was co-founder and president of Infoarena.ro, the largest Romanian organization of Computer Science geeks.

Cristian is the co-author of Solving Maximum Flow Problems on Real World Bipartite Graphs, which was presented at ALENEX09.

Cristian studied Mathematics and Informatics at the University of Bucharest and won numerous programming competitions and awards.
